caseName: Deck v. Steele
cause: 28:2254 Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus (State)
firm: ATTORNEY GENERAL OF MISSOURI, Assistant Attorney General

recap_documents.description: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER (See Full Order) IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that the amended  petition of Carman L. Deck for writ of habeas corpus  30  is granted as to the  sentence of death only, based on Claims 31 and 32(a) as discussed above,  and denied in all o ther respects. Petitioners death penalty is vacated.  Because the constitutional deficiencies cannot be cured and Deck cannot now be  subjected to a penalty-phase trial that comports with due process, he must  be sentenced to life in prison without the possibility of parole.  An  appropriate judgment granting the writ of habeas corpus is issued this same date. Signed by District Judge Catherine D. Perry on 4/13/17.  (EAB)
